name: Ollie: The World Destroyer
description:
A platformer game with a character that can use his wrench as a melee and ranged weapon to activate machines, reach the heater, activate it and run from the affected area.

The game is only played using a keyboard and mouse.

Used font: Pixel Musketeer

This game is made by:
M77mdsD: Code, Level Design:
Youtube, Twitter, Itch
Kafe: Code:
Itch
AproposRobin: Art:
Itch
Bakobiibizo: Music, Sound Effects:
Website, Itch

This version is pretty short and will be updated, Write your feedback because it will be taken under consideration.
